\bBecause it's your first time winning the Battle Pyramid, you get this!
\bFeel free to challenge the Battle Pyramid again- but if you do, future victories will only shell out Rare Candies, Heart Scales, and IV Stones.
\bWe've been waiting for you.  Please come this way.

I can't just waltz in without a partner!
\rLittle is known about the PokeRus except that they
\bWould you like to begin a Battle Pyramid challenge?
\bOk! First, you will have to pick three Pokemon for your team.
\bThere are a few rules your team must abide by.\nFor example, Uber Pokemon are considered banned, and the Sleep and Freeze clauses are included.
\bYou also cannot bring in an egg, and you must have 4 different species of Pokemon- no duplicates!
\bFix up your team, then come back!
\bWe've found a partner for this round!\nThe great \rLeader \v[1]\c[0]!
\bThe Battle Pyramid is a challenge where you have to ascend the floors of a dangerous pyramid, attempting to get to the top.
\bYou will get a partner from the Gym Leaders onboard Phoenix Iota, and you will travel together, for the duration of a challenge.
\bYou will encounter other pairs of partners on your way up.\nIf you lose a battle, you lose the challenge.
\bYour bag will be emptied until the challenge is completed. However, you can find items during the challenge that you can use.
